snippet.title: Sunset Land Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
An 8-bit sci-fi, gangster, western adventure for the NES.

Welcome to the planet Venture, where it’s sunset all the time.
Your mission is to steal three Stellar Crystals, artifacts which contain tremendous amounts of energy, for an intergalactic mob boss. Your ever increasing psychic powers will be the key to victory. Use psychic blasts to fight the vicious enemies that stand in your way and use carefully timed air jumps to navigate deadly platforming challenges.

Website: https://rivetgungames.com/sunsetland/

The game will be available on physical NES cartridges and PC soon.
